title: Bug 121687: Exception thrown when exporting data from a table inside a grid cell
description: When attempting to export data from a table that is contained within a grid cell, an exception is thrown. This issue occurs when inserting one table into one grid cell, and then inserting another table into a different grid cell.
OB: An exception is thrown when attempting to export data from a table inside a grid cell.
EB: Data should be successfully exported from the table inside the grid cell without any exceptions being thrown.
SR: To reproduce this issue: 1. Insert a table into one grid cell. 2. Insert another table into a different grid cell. 3. Attempt to export data from the table inside the grid cell. Verify that an exception is thrown.
